DOC.brief_title: Serum Procalcitonin Level May Predict Acute Kidney Injury ICU Patients With Sepsis
DOC.detailed_description: 67 patient sepsis enrol study . On admission , PCT measure together serum creatinine , urea , inflammatory marker . Quick Sepsis-related Organ Failure Assessment calculate emergency department . Patients classify Acute kidney injury ( AKI ) non-AKI group .
